markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Kovintus](/Traits.aspx?ID=355)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 309</row>

Reclusive humanoids with an inborn talent for geomancy, kovintus have an intrinsic tie to nature and magic alike.
name: Kovintus
